clients

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalClient, NetworkClient

    public interface Client
    Represents an abstraction of the clients in the game.
    Author:
    Cacciatore Celia - Bauduin Raphael

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection of the client.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Tranfers a message from the game to the client.
      java.lang.String sendMessageWithAnswer(java.lang.String receivedMessage)
      Tranfers a message from the game to the client, and then returns the client's answer to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessageWithAnswer

        java.lang.String sendMessageWithAnswer(java.lang.String receivedMessage)
        Tranfers a message from the game to the client, and then returns the client's answer to the game.
        Parameters:
        receivedMessage - message received from the game
        Returns:
        the client's answer
